item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: went to "chocolate tools" because I thought it would be about kitchen gadgets specifically designed ro create chocolate delights. Guess I have to read things more literally. Did you check out the "meat gallery" under slashfood? karimamma
item.content:encoded:
went to “chocolate tools” because I thought it would be about kitchen gadgets specifically designed ro create chocolate delights. Guess I have to read things more literally.
Did you check out the “meat gallery” under slashfood?
karimamma
